about_the_game:
DOBRO LOVE FANTASY QUEST is a self aware parody of modern society. It is an open-world visual novel with life-sim and action-adventure RPG elements set in the megalopolis of New Bonk City. You play as a simple dobro wrapped up in a close family death that takes you back to your old hometown. Customize your character and survive the concrete jungle as you take on jobs, make friends, and find romance. The relationships you forge and the choices you make will shape the story and the world around you. Dobro legends are made here. What will yours be?





Become a legend in New Bonk City? Or crash and burn? Choose your dobro's origin and future ambitions as you work your way up the ladder. Take on odd jobs, addicting mini-games and discover random events and questlines that will either get you closer to your chosen goals or greatly increase your wallet. Will you gain the world or lose everything in the blink of an eye?





The long awaited turn-based RPG has released and copies are flying off the shelf at every game shop in New Bonk City! Battle fierce monsters, level up and equip your character with the finest gear you can craft and set forth towards endless dungeons... if you manage to find a copy. And some cash, quick!





With branching storylines and customization options that affect dialogue and influence characters, DLFQ makes every playthrough unique as your choices will have real consequences in the in-game world. With a 500 day dog year game limit, the game introduces roguelike gameplay and becomes a balancing act of finishing sidequests, romancing characters, and the endless grind and hustle of city life.





Featuring an accurate simulation of market economics, invest and trade lucrative and non-sensical memecoins that pokes fun at the absurdity of the financial world. Go all in on a Hail Mary or play the market like a pro. There's a lotta money that can be gained or lost in the market, but always remember what you neglect along the way.
detailed_description:
DOBRO LOVE FANTASY QUEST is a self aware parody of modern society. It is an open-world visual novel with life-sim and action-adventure RPG elements set in the megalopolis of New Bonk City. You play as a simple dobro wrapped up in a close family death that takes you back to your old hometown. Customize your character and survive the concrete jungle as you take on jobs, make friends, and find romance. The relationships you forge and the choices you make will shape the story and the world around you. Dobro legends are made here. What will yours be?





Become a legend in New Bonk City? Or crash and burn? Choose your dobro's origin and future ambitions as you work your way up the ladder. Take on odd jobs, addicting mini-games and discover random events and questlines that will either get you closer to your chosen goals or greatly increase your wallet. Will you gain the world or lose everything in the blink of an eye?





The long awaited turn-based RPG has released and copies are flying off the shelf at every game shop in New Bonk City! Battle fierce monsters, level up and equip your character with the finest gear you can craft and set forth towards endless dungeons... if you manage to find a copy. And some cash, quick!





With branching storylines and customization options that affect dialogue and influence characters, DLFQ makes every playthrough unique as your choices will have real consequences in the in-game world. With a 500 day dog year game limit, the game introduces roguelike gameplay and becomes a balancing act of finishing sidequests, romancing characters, and the endless grind and hustle of city life.





Featuring an accurate simulation of market economics, invest and trade lucrative and non-sensical memecoins that pokes fun at the absurdity of the financial world. Go all in on a Hail Mary or play the market like a pro. There's a lotta money that can be gained or lost in the market, but always remember what you neglect along the way.
legal_notice: DISCLAIMER: The game is intended for entertainment purposes only and is to be enjoyed as a tribute to the community. Any depiction of real persons, living or dead, in this game is purely coincidental, is intended purely as a satire, parody, or spoof, or has been depicted with express permission. Please note that any such depictions should not be taken as an accurate representation of the individual's character, history, or any current or future actions or events.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is non-notarized. May not work with 10.15 Catalina

name: DOBRO LOVE FANTASY QUEST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A charming community passion-project, this visual novel turned life-sim hybrid features funny meme dogs and a coming of age story. Play as a simple dobro in a big city that parodies life in the modern world. Will you find true love or endless riches?
